I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get the present weather for any city. Use format weather: city name 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 6. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 7. I can set a timer for you. Enter 'set a timer: minutes to timer' 
 8. I can get the present Covid stats for any country. Use 'covid 19: world' or 'covid 19: country name' 
 For suggestions to help me improve, send an email to ted.thedlbot.suggestions@gmail.com . Thank you!!

What two things can you never eat for breakfast?.....Lunch and Dinner!
What word is spelled incorrectly in every single dictionary?.....Incorrectly
How can a girl go 25 days without sleep?.....She sleeps and night!
How do you make the number one disappear?.....Add the letter G and it’s 'gone'!
What will you actually find at the end of every rainbow?.....The letter 'w'
What can be caught but never thrown?.....A cold!
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not actually alive?.....Your Gloves!
What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?.....Short
Why can't a bike stand on it's own?.....It is two-tired.

The University is located on a beautiful 12-acre campus on the 

 GT Karnal Highway (North of Delhi) on GT Road within Delhi-NCR limits.

patterns: I wanna contact someone from the campus
responses:
You can contact us through our helpdesk numbers 7056770061 at the campus. 
We also have a helpdesk at Greater Kailash (Delhi) .
You can also WhatsApp at 7056770065.

patterns: Can I visit the University campus?
When can I see the campus?
How can I see the campus?
responses: Yes, you can visit Monday-Saturday between 10.00 am and 5.00 pm.
You can visit the campus Monday-Saturday between 10.00 am and and 5.00 pm

patterns: What all courses does the university offer?
responses:
UNDERGRADUATE BArch (5years)|BDes - Product Design, Interior Design, Lifestyle Accessory Design, Fashion Design, Graphic Communication Design, Animation & Game Design (4 Years)|BVA - Creative Painting, Applied Arts (4 Years)|BBA - Design Strategy and Management ,Retail Business Management (3 years)

POSTGRADUATE MDes - Industrial Design, Transportation Design, Retail Design (2 years)|MVA -Art and Design History, Curatorial Practices in Art, Fashion Art, Contemporary Art Practice (2 Years) |MBA - Design Strategy and Management

DIPLOMA Fashion Design |Graphics & web Design|Photography

patterns: What is the fee structure at wud?
responses:
A. Architecture –Rs.8,00,000/- 
|Design- Rs. 9,00,000/-
|Art-Rs.5,20,000/-
|Management – Rs.5,10,000/-
Rs.18000/- is Registration Fees.
*Not Refundable onetime payment for all courses.

patterns: Is any caution money included in your fee structure
responses: No we don't charge any caution money.

patterns: Can we pay fees in installment or is it semester wise?
Can fees be payed semester wise?
responses: The fee payment is annual.

patterns: Where can I find the application form?
responses: Student can download the application form from our website www.worlduniversityofdesign.ac.in , Student can ask for it on an email or can collect it from our campus. It can be send via Email or by post along with the application fee of Rs 1000/-, which can be paid by cash/cheque/ Demand Draft/RTGS or NEFT bank transfer.

patterns: Can we submit the application form without submitting the 10+2 exam mark sheet?
responses: Yes, the application can be submitted before declaration of the results. However, candidates applying for admission will be eventually required to fulfil all the eligibility criteria for admission to the programme. Their admission will be purely provisional, subject to their satisfying the prescribed eligibility conditions. If on verification at any time before or after the Written Test and Interview, it is found that candidate does not fulfil eligibility criteria, his / her candidature for the admission shall stand cancelled without any notice or further reference.

patterns: What is the general calendar of the admission process?
responses:
The applications are open from November. 
Specific information can be seen in brochure or 
on the website of the University.

Admission Form - Aptitude Test - Campus Interview - Offer Letter.
After receiving the application form, it will be processed for eligibility of the candidate.
Eligible candidates will be informed about the date/time of the tests/interview.
Wherever applicable WUDs DAT/AAT or GAT Aptitude Tests will be conducted.
For admission to B Arch program, NATA of JEE scores will be required.

Candidates will be required to bring requisite documents in original along with their attested photocopies. 
Details about course specific admission process are mentioned in the Information Brochure.

patterns: What is the eligibility criteria for admissions in wud?
responses:
Eligibility for Bachelor Programmes:
Candidates who have completed their 10+2 level or equivalent exams 
like AISSCE/ IB/ ICSE/ State Board etc. (in relevant stream) are 
eligible to apply for undergraduate degree programmes.
In addition to marks in the qualifying examinations, the admission will be based on performance in Aptitudes Test followed by a personal interview.

Eligibility for Masters Programmes:
Candidates who have completed 3/4-year full-time bachelors in Design/ Engineering/Architecture/ Fine Arts or equivalent, are eligible to apply. Candidates who have appeared in the qualifying exams and the results are expected to be declared latest by 31st October can also apply. The admission will be based on performance in Aptitude Test followed by a personal interview.

patterns: When and where is the entrance test conducted
Where is the entrance test conducted
responses: While the Admission procedure will be conducted at WUD Campus, the Entrance Test Schedule and centers will be as listed on the website.

patterns: What is the age limit for applying?
What age should I be to apply
responses: The upper age limit for applying in bachelor programmes is restricted to 20 years relaxable up to 3 years on proving genuine evidence of discontinuity in education profile. However for Post graduate programmes there is no age limit.

patterns: What are the facilities provided on campus in terms of services to the students?
What are the facilities for students on campus
responses: WUD has created excellent physical and academic infrastructure like labs, library and studios, workshops, computer labs (including Apple Mac platform). There are hostels, canteens, sports zone, medical facilities including doctor, Internet access and transport facility.

patterns: Can we pay fees in installment or is it semester wise?
Can fees be payed semester wise?
responses: The fee payment is annual.

patterns: Can we pay fees in installment or is it semester wise?
Can fees be payed semester wise?
responses: The fee payment is annual.

patterns: Does WUD provide Hostel/Residential facility for students?
responses: WUD provides state-of-the-art boarding facility on campus for girl students and boy students.

patterns: What is the fee structure of Girls Hostel/Boys Hostel?
How much is the hostel fee?
responses:
The fee structure for hostel is based on actual expenses incurred and is revised every year. The fee for 2018-19 is :
Girls Twin Sharing in campus (165000/-per year) for Accommodation and meals
Boys Four Sharing off campus (165000/-Per year) for Accommodation and meals

patterns: What other facilities are included in the hostel
responses: Apart from spacious air-conditioned rooms with attached bathrooms, there are Common Rooms, Sports facility and 24 hour Security. Food and laundry facilities are among the best in the country. Safe and healthy environment is provided to the students.

patterns: At what time do classes start everyday?
responses: The class timings are from 9:30-4:30. But there may be extensions on certain days based on the course requirement

patterns: How much instake do you have in each course?
How many students in each course?
responses: Architecture 40 seats, Rest all courses 40 seats each except Fashion which has 60 seats.

patterns: Which is the best course for me?
responses: TYou can come for a counseling session in the campus to enquire about the courses in detail and match to your interest. Moreover there will be a formal counseling at the time of interview with an esteemed panel to see to your interest matching your creative aptitude test. If still doubt persists you can decide after 6 months of common foundation programme to see what course match your potential.
